sentences.english: A chill that had nothing to do with the iced champagne was stealing through Harry's chest.
sentences.chinese: 一股與冰鎮香檳酒無關的寒意穿過哈利的臉膛。

sentences.english: The skin of your cheeks will tan.
sentences.chinese: 你的臉膛會曬的烏黑髮亮。

sentences.english: A blush mantled over the bronzed cheek of the gladiator.
sentences.chinese: 鬥士古銅色的臉膛頓時漲得通紅。

sentences.english: His hair was combed and his face was red with white patches .
sentences.chinese: 他整理了頭髮，臉膛通紅，還有幾塊白斑。

sentences.english: But a bullet fired very close to the policeman struck his chest.
sentences.chinese: 但是一顆子彈近距離朝他的臉膛發射。
